Name: A Frustrating Platformer
About the game: This game offers a frustrating classic platforming experience. What to look out for! Dodge and jump over spikes, saws, arrows and fast spikeheads as you progress through this daunting 2D level. Watch your in-game death counter tally up as the obstacles and even the map itself fight you. Roadmap More content will be released in the near future for FREE! Featuring all new levels, containing new enemies, mechanics and animations, keep your eye out for further updates! Chinese, Russian and Spanish language support now included!
